cacheFile.#####: Cache file name. If empty, execution is handled by the 'exec' function.

removeComment.#####: Comment removal mode. Set to 'true' to enable comment removal, 'false' to retain comments.

removeBlankLine.#####: Blank line removal mode. Set to 'true' to remove blank lines, 'false' to keep them.

useInterpreter.#####: Interpreter mode. Set to 'true' to enable interpreter mode, 'false' to transpile only.

pythonCommand.#####: Python command (If left blank, it will be 'python' on Windows and 'python3' on other platforms)

transpilerFile.#####: File name of the aopy transpiler.
